items.sentence: Tom and Mary like to get together and play cards.
Tom and Mary looked like they were about to kiss.
Tom and Mary are going to get hitched in October.
Tom and Mary are going to get married in October.
Tom and Mary are going to have a baby next month.
I finally talked Tom into lending me his bicycle.
There was a lot of food left over from the party.
We\'ll be paying close attention to what happens.
We\'re moving to Boston at the end of this month.
We\'re not entirely sure why Tom did what he did.
